events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and the color is different from what was displayed online.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the request for a refund due to size and color discrepancy.
The case has been assigned to the refund processing team to handle the customer's request and provide the necessary assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or if the tags are still attached so we can proceed with the refund?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket has not been worn yet and the tags are still intact. I hope this is sufficient information.
Thank you for providing the details. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. Please use the prepaid shipping label included in your package for the return.
Thanks for the prompt response and the clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today and look forward to the refund.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. You should see the credit within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to serve you better next time.
